content:
Name Crit Effect Type
Crunch The target is sickened 3. Bludgeoning
Forearm Piercing The target drops one weapon it's holding (chosen randomly by the GM). Piercing
Surprise Opening You gain 1 action that you can use before the end of your turn to use an attack action against the target. Slashing
Allergic reaction The target takes 1d8 poison damage. Bomb or Spell
name: Critical Hit Deck #1
